changeSet.author: thickerson
changeSet.comment: Change oc_qrtz_job_details class names for EXPORT DATA JOBS
changeSet.sql: update oc_qrtz_job_details set job_class_name = 'org.akaza.openclinica.web.job.ExampleStatefulJob' where job_class_name = 'org.akaza.openclinica.service.job.ExampleStatefulJob'

changeSet.author: thickerson
changeSet.comment: Change oc_qrtz_job_details class names for IMPORT DATA JOBS
changeSet.sql: update oc_qrtz_job_details set job_class_name = 'org.akaza.openclinica.web.job.ImportStatefulJob' where job_class_name = 'org.akaza.openclinica.service.job.ImportStatefulJob'
